name: QrPngPaletteMode
summary: Palette selection modes for QR modules.

fields.name: Cycle
fields.summary: Cycles through colors using (x + y) ordering.

fields.name: Checker
fields.summary: Alternates colors in a checkerboard pattern.

fields.name: Random
fields.summary: Picks colors using a deterministic hash of (x, y, seed).

fields.name: Rings
fields.summary: Assigns colors by ring distance from the center.
